Outstanding Sales Assistant

Sales assistants typically work in retail companies and are responsible for liaising with customers to ensure transactions are processed smoothly. They are ‘people persons’ as well as salespeople in helping customers enjoy the shopping process.

Sales Assistants are expected to have an outgoing personality and possess excellent knowledge of the company’s products and services. It may also be necessary to have a good working knowledge of computer systems and other machines relevant to the role.

Here are some of the job titles our recruitment specialists are recruiting for:

  • Retail Sales Assistant
  • Assistant Sales Manager
  • Sales & Marketing Assistant
  • Pharmacy Sales Assistant
  • Internal Sales & Purchasing Assistant
  • Deli Assistant

Our Average Salary

Our last Sales Assistants earned an average of $40,000 per year.
